content: do not turn 1 in a magic_ring make 6sc pull ring tail to close tightly 6 crochet blo for the following rounds 2-9 2 2sc in the next single_crochet in the next 3 times 9 3 2sc in the next single_crochet in the next 2 3 times 12 4 2sc in the next single_crochet in the next 3 3 times 15 dorsal fin 5 2sc in the next single_crochet in the next 4 3 times 18 6 8 single_crochet in each stitch around 9 decrease around 9 crochet through both loops now 10 single_crochet in each stitch around stuff full 11 fold the opening flat working through both layers to join place 4 single_crochet across the opening do not fo 4 first tail fin ch7 slip_stitch in the 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet in the next half_double_crochet in the next double_crochet in the next 2 half_double_crochet in the last skip the 1st stitch of row 11 and slip_stitch into the 2nd pectoral fins second tail fin pectoral fins slip_stitch into 3rd stitch of row 11 ch7 slip_stitch in the 2nd the pectoral fins should line up with about the very chain from the hook single_crochet in the next half_double_crochet in the next front of the dorsal fin you can just eyeball where to double_crochet in the next 2 half_double_crochet in the last slip_stitch into the last put them once again you will be working into the stitch of row 11 do not fo free loops - 2 loops on each side and leave 2 loops space between the top of the pectoral fins dorsal fin and the dorsal fin ch1 working into the free loops in a straight line up the back slip_stitch into a loop on the next row join with a ch1 half_double_crochet in the 1st loop half_double_crochet ch1 slip_stitch in the next loop slip_stitch ch1 half_double_crochet double_crochet into a loop on the next row fo pull the joins tight and use your hook to pull 3dc into a loop on the next row the tails through to the ends of the body and trim them off repeat for the other side half_double_crochet double_crochet into a loop on the next row give to cat stand by to rescue from under sofa ch1 slip_stitch into a loop on the next row fo caution because this is a fast project and ends use your hook to pull the tail through the fish and are not sewn little pieces could come off with lots out the end trim any excess of tugging regularly inspect your pet s toys 5-minute fish for pattern assistance email only please © 2015 jenna wingate designs
